(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNP Fish) (NNP Saba))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ favorite) (NN fish))
      (PP (IN amongst)
        (NP (DT the) (NNPS Japanese))))
    (. .)))


det(Saba-3, The-1)
nn(Saba-3, Fish-2)
nsubj(fish-7, Saba-3)
cop(fish-7, is-4)
det(fish-7, a-5)
amod(fish-7, favorite-6)
root(ROOT-0, fish-7)
prep(fish-7, amongst-8)
det(Japanese-10, the-9)
pobj(amongst-8, Japanese-10)

          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (VP (VBN found)
                (PP (IN in)

                    (NP (DT the) (NNS waters))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NNP Japan)))))))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP Saba))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADVP (RB often))
        (VP (VBN cured))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ only) (NNS people))
        (ADJP (JJ fortunate) (RB enough)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB be)
                (ADJP (JJ able)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB eat)
                        (NP (JJ fresh) (NNP Saba))
                        (PP (IN as)
                          (NP (NNS sashimi))))))))))))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (NP (DT the) (NNS fishermen) (PRP themselves))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP

        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ causes)
              (NP
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ typical) (JJ allergic) (NN reaction))

                    (NP (NN rash))))
                (CC and)
                (NP
                  (NP (JJ runny) (NN nose))

                        (SBAR
                          (WHADVP (WRB why))
                          (S
                            (NP (NNS anti-histamines))

                                  (NP (DT these) (NNS conditions)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (NNP Singapore)))
    (, ,)))

          (JJ meaty))))

      (NP (DT this))

  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB be)
        (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NNP Hikari) (NNP Mono))

          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB start)
              (PP (IN with)))))
        (SBAR (IN as)
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NNS fishiness) (NN scale))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (NP
                (QP (RB only) (CD 2\/5))))))))
    (. .)))
